Title: On critical values of L-functions of potentially automorphic motives
Abstract: © 2016, The Author(s).In this paper we prove a version of Deligne’s conjecture for potentially automorphic motives, twisted by certain algebraic Hecke characters. The Hecke characters are chosen in such a way that we can use automorphic methods in the context of totally definite unitary groups.
